short_summary: Three (3) Senior Computer Application Support. Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR).
full_summary:
===============

### Government Tender Announcement: Three Senior Computer Application Support Personnel

#### Official Reference Number

* CB-6245-90239423

#### Tender Title

* ***English Title:*** Three (3) Senior Computer Application Support Personnel under the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)
* ***French Title:*** Trois (3) personnel en support informatique pour les applications principales pour la région de la capitale nationale (RCN)

#### Tender Details

* Solicitation Number:  S4489012
* Amendment Number:  1
* Publication Date:  July 7, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: June 16, 2023, 12:00:00
* Amendment Date: June 16, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 11, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: April 1, 2024
* Tender Status: Expired

#### Tender Description

The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking temporary help services for senior computer application support personnel. The service requirement is open to supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who have been qualified under the streams and categories: Special Advisor.

Only the following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
* 8513929 Canada Inc.
* Adirondack Information Management Inc., The AIM Group Inc. in Joint Venture
* Advanced Chippewa Technologies Inc.
* Calian Ltd.
* Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
* CSI Consulting Inc.
* HubSpoke Inc.
* IPSS INC.
* Makwa Resourcing Inc. and Koroc Consulting Inc. in JOINT VENTURE
* Maverin Inc.
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
* Promaxis Systems Inc
* S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
* SEASI Consulting Inc.

The tender requirement involves providing temporary computer application support personnel with a secret clearance level. The temporary help services are expected to commence on July 11, 2023, and end on April 1, 2024.

#### RFP Document

The tender RFP document is available for download at the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6245/s4489012-rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/
